import React from "react"; import "./TripInfo.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' function TripInfo(props) { const {selectedCity} = {props} return (

Day 1

Vina Robles winery

Day 2

Sensorio Field of Lights

Check out of your accomodation and head back to Los Angeles

 ) } export default TripInfo;
